explains: adj. 灌足酒的；患踵炎症的；醉的；加过润滑脂的
wordGroup: lubricating grease 滑脂；润滑脂；润滑膏
grease the wheels v. 使顺利进行；贿赂
grease lubrication n. 滑脂润滑；油脂润滑
elbow grease 费力的工作；重活
grease gun 黄油枪，滑脂枪
silicone grease 硅脂；硅润滑脂
high temperature grease 高温润滑脂；高温润滑油
grease spots 油斑（纸病）（grease spot的复数）

sentences.en: I greased front and rear hubs and adjusted the brakes.
sentences.cn: 我把前后轮轴都加了润滑油并调试了刹车。

sentences.en: Iron corrodes unless it is greased or kept clean.
sentences.cn: 铁除非擦过油或保持清洁，否则会腐蚀。

sentences.en: The cook greased the pan before frying the vegetables.
sentences.cn: 厨师炒菜前先在锅底涂上一层油。
